name: Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Blades of the Shinigami (itch)
name_original: Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Blades of the Shinigami (itch)
description:
Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Katana no ha Shinigami,  is a  beautiful story rich, single & online player vs player game, that combines roguelike, deck building, and strategy, to create a story driven JRPG card battler that consists of thrilling adventures, exciting challenges & strategic gameplay, that can be enjoyed single player, or in epic duels of wits, tactics, & strategy against other players online.

Inspired by games such as Hearthstone, Slay the spire, Mortal Kombat, & classic JRPGs, in Ninja Vs Samurai single player stories, set off on an adventure with unique heroes, putting your skills & deck to the test, in stories inspired by battles & heroes of futile Japan & japanese myths & legends, that delivers a twisted and gripping narrative filled with tragedy, death, betrayal, and redemption.
